rules_text:
Whenever another creature you control dies for the first time each turn, create three 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature tokens with “When this creature dies, surveil 1.”
Blight {4}{W}{W} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {4}{W}{W}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Whenever a nontoken creature enters under your control, choose one–
• Target opponent creates a copy of that creature, except it has base power and toughness 1/1.
• Target opponent gains 1 life and draws a card.
